Question
========
What are characteristics of nominal level of measurement?

Answerlist
----------
* It is the lowest level of measurement.
* It divides observations into groups.
* There is no inherent order.
* This is a type of categorical variable.
* Categories are mutually exclusive.
* Can be known as qualitative data.
* This level of measurement can be transformed to a lower level of measurement.
* Ratios can be formed from numbers on this scale.
* There is a known consistent distance between measurement points
